text: Serena is a drama movie that will be released in April 2014. The story is about a wife that cannot have children. Jennifer Lawrence plays Serena, Bradley Cooper plays her husband George. The movie is based on the novel Serena (2008) by Ron Rash.Tatiana Siegel, New Jennifer Lawrence-Bradley Cooper Movie Quietly Shopped to Buyers, The Holywood Reporter (November 25, 2013) == References == Category:2014 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:French drama movies
title: Serena
